definitions.definition: Arranged like rays that radiate from, or converge to, a common centre .
examples: The spokes on most modern bicycle wheels are tangential to the hub rather than radial .

definitions.definition: Of, or relating to a radius (line joining to a geometric centre).
examples: What is the relationship between arc length and radial length?

subdefinitions.definition: Moving or acting along a radius .

definitions.definition: Of, or relating to the radius bone .
Of, or relating to the radius ( vein ) , and/or the wing areas next to it.
Having reinforcing cords placed in parallel across the tyre at 90 degrees to the direction of travel, especially as contrasted with cross-ply ; see also radial tyre .

main_definition: Arranged like rays that radiate from, or converge to, a common centre .
secondary_definitions: ( geometry ) Of, or relating to a radius (line joining to a geometric centre).
( anatomy ) Of, or relating to the radius bone .
( entomology ) Of, or relating to the radius ( vein ) , and/or the wing areas next to it.
( botany ) Developing uniformly on all sides.
( of a vehicle tyre ) Having reinforcing cords placed in parallel across the tyre at 90 degrees to the direction of travel, especially as contrasted with cross-ply ; see also radial tyre .
